comment: /**  * Executes the given {@code task} synchronously, through direct  * invocation of it's {@link Runnable#run() run()} method.  * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the given {@code task} is {@code null}  */
code: /**  * Executes the given {@code task} synchronously, through direct  * invocation of it's {@link Runnable#run() run()} method.  * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the given {@code task} is {@code null}  */ @Override public void execute(Runnable task) {     Assert.notNull(task, "Runnable must not be null").     task.run(). }
